attributes.action: Stop the blatent disrespect and prevention of Poppys in Britain
attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the government to implement some kind of law that stops any kind of company or local authority to ban the sellling and disrespecting of one of our national symbols. On a final note we would like to add that the men and women who fought and died for Britain and for freedom;and for whom the represents died for you, and without them there would be no freedom or democracy in this world. LEST WE FORGET
